Comments_List: Learned a bunch of new vocabulary and culture and more aspects of the Indonesian language.
I have learned more Indonesian than I have Spanish in 5 yrs of middle/high school
I learned much more of the language and how to develop my sentences to become more complex.
The material in this class is super great. The projects we do are interesting because most of the time we choose what we do them on. Honestly, could be a little more intensive.
There could be a greater focus on vocabulary
A lot of conversation is a strength
Could be improved by less YouTube videos and more hands on instruction.
The strengths of the course were the fun engagement of every class. I am excited to go to class.

Absolutely. Pak Indriyo is so passionate about what he teaches and he does it super well. It's such an interesting language and culture as well, so it's great for if you're looking for something a little different.
Yes its a lot of fun
Yes, the class is always fun. I love to learn the language and about the culture of Indonesia.
